overview: The bad boys, Erik Everhard and Nacho Vidal, are back, on the horny hunt for naughty, new girlfriends and hopefully, a sexy roommate. Beautiful Jesse Jane slides in as the lead candidate to fill their lusty needs with her dripping desire. Gorgeous Riley Steele, Charley Chase and Holly Michaels are game for wild times with hard member dudes, but hung stud Manuel Ferrara proves that his house is loaded with loose screws in need of a good hammering!
tagline: She's Got Your Tool In Hand!
title: Home Wrecker 3
